channel.title: How do you pack npc drops on 667/704?
channel.description: Hey guys, i can't seem to pack my NPC drops on 667/704.. My NPCDrops file in the utils folder doesn't read how to pack npc drops.. i know alot of people have this problem at the moment. Is there a way to fix it? or does anyone know how to repack them? I have them unpacked already.. just need help packing them :s

item.title: How do you pack npc drops on 667/704?
item.dc:creator: @blakew blakew
item.description:
@blakew wrote:

Hey guys, i can’t seem to pack my NPC drops on 667/704… My NPCDrops file in the utils folder doesn’t read how to pack npc drops… i know alot of people have this problem at the moment. Is there a way to fix it? or does anyone know how to repack them? I have them unpacked already… just need help packing them :s
